data.description:
Tired of relying on expensive and time-consuming lab training sessions for your science education? Look no further than our VR science lab simulation and training application!

GOLINELLI LiVE - Live Virtual Experience provides a fully immersive and interactive virtual laboratory experience, allowing users to conduct experiments and train in a safe and controlled environment. No more worrying about the costs and risks associated with real-world lab sessions. With our application, you can practice and develop your practical skills and knowledge without the limitations of physical lab space.

Our VR lab is designed to simulate a wide range of biology lab environments. The application offers access to a diverse set of lab equipment and materials, as well as guidance and feedback from lab assistants. Our interactive simulations will allow you to perform experiments, make observations, and analyze data, all in real-time.

Our VR lab application is the perfect solution for schools, universities, and organizations looking to improve their science education and training programs. Our simulations are designed to enhance the learning experience and increase knowledge retention. Our platform is also customizable, allowing for tailored lab simulations to meet specific educational needs and goals.

Say goodbye to the limitations of traditional lab settings and embrace the future of science education and training with our cutting-edge VR lab simulation application.

changelog.change_log: Fix Tutorial softlock when controller not found
